snippet.title: Fantasy Friends - Trailer - EN
snippet.description:
Welcome to Fantasy Friends, a world of magic and fantasy where you're responsible for taking care of fantastic creatures! To be released at the end of 2020, Fantasy Friends will bring a little bit of magic to the Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, and PC.

More information : https://www.justforgames.com/product/fantasy-friends/

Come & discuss with us on our Discord :
discord.me/justforgames

Follow us on social networks :
https://twitter.com/justforgames
https://www.facebook.com/justforgames
https://www.instagram.com/justforgames
